content.prompt: Which of the following was the most likely purpose of the portraits of the emperor?

choices.label: To demonstrate the Mughal Empire’s conversion to Islam
To honor the continued influence of Hellenistic art forms in India
To represent the Mughal belief in the emperor’s divinity
To glorify his rule through the sponsorship of artworks

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience.
